itunes:title: Episode 757 - Sons of Liberty Gunworks
title: Episode 757 - Sons of Liberty Gunworks
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are Joined by Mike Mihalski and Nick Bishop of Sons of Liberty Gunworks in San Antonio, Texas to talk about building custom firearms, the ammo shortage and Mike’s experience during this current ‘gun rush’ as compared to pr...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are Joined by Mike Mihalski and Nick Bishop of Sons of Liberty Gunworks in San Antonio, Texas to talk about building custom firearms, the ammo shortage and Mike’s experience during this current ‘gun rush’ as compared to previous gun rushes, what sort of gun they’d recommend for first time owners, hunting and eating hogs in Texas, and why black gun ownership was up in 2020.
